<title level="1" right="Rules">[Crafting a Tattoo](/Rules.aspx?ID=1497)</title>

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 164 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Inking a magical tattoo onto a creature is much like etching a rune onto an item. The tattooist uses the [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) activity, and the subject must be present throughout the process. The tattooist must meet any special Craft requirements, and they can ink only one tattoo at a time. Not only does a magical tattoo not have any effect until the Craft activity is complete, but it also requires a healing period. Though this time frame can last up to a month, applying magical or alchemical healing can shorten it to as little as a day.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
